title: Adventure
description: To explore the unknown, to get exciting, unusual, and sometimes dangerous experience.

title: Aesthetics
description: To appreciate or study the nature of beauty in arts, ideas, surroundings or objects.

title: Attractiveness
description: To have an attractive appearance.

title: Belonging
description: To be accepted as a worthwhile member of a particular group of people.

title: Caring
description: To show compassion, to help those in need, to care for others.

title: Community
description: To belong to a group of people that has a larger purpose beyond one's self. To perform in effective and caring teamwork.

title: Competition
description: To participate in activities that pit personal skills and abilities against others.

title: Conformity
description: To act and behave with social norms.

title: Control
description: To be in command of your surroundings.

title: Cooperation
description: To accomplish complex tasks together. To act towards a common purpose.

title: Creativity
description: To express your ideas in new and unique way. To be innovative.

title: Discovery
description: To learn something that was not known before, to identify new approaches.

title: Diversity
description: To appreciate differences in people, ideas, situations and places.

title: Economic Security
description: To have a steady income that fully meets my family's basic needs.

title: Family
description: To build and maintain a close knit family.

title: Fairness
description: To demonstrate a commitment to impartiality and honesty : free from self-interest, prejudice, or favoritism.

title: Fidelity
description: To be faithful and loyal to family and friends.

title: Friendship
description: To connect with people you trust and respect and to be trusted and respected by them.

title: Health
description: To maintain a healthy body and mind.

title: Honesty
description: To live honesty, to be sincere.

title: Humility
description: To demonstrate modesty in in dress, speech, or conduct.

title: Independence
description: To have freedom of thought and action. To be able to act in terms of your own time schedules and priorities.

title: Influence
description: To have a power of producing an effect without apparent exertion of force or direct exercise of command. To have a moral force of changing attitudes or beliefs of other people.

title: Knowledge
description: To be engaged in the pursuit of scholarship, truth and understanding.

title: Leadership
description: To have the ability to motivate and inspire other people.

title: Location
description: The ability to live where you want to live.

title: Love
description: The presence of love in your life. To love your family, your friends, yourself. To open your mind to the concept of love.

title: Luxury
description: To enjoy the most expensive things around you.

title: Passion
description: To feel a strong enthusiasm or interest in people, purpose and activities.

title: Personal Development
description: To learn and to do challenging work, activities that develop talents and potential.

title: Pleasure
description: To seek enjoyment, satisfaction, sensual gratification and fun.

title: Pursuit of Excellence
description: To perform tasks to the best of your ability.

title: Recognition
description: To seek special notice or attention for well done tasks.

title: Relaxation
description: To seek relaxing or recreative state, activity, or pastime.

title: Respect
description: To recognize othersâ€™ achievements and beliefs, to treat them with respect.

title: Responsibility
description: To demonstrate the quality of being responsible as moral, legal, or mental accountability. Reliability, trustworthiness.

title: Risk taking
description: To aspire to the difficult, challenging and sometimes impossible.

title: Security
description: To be free from fear, danger, or risk, to exist in a stable environment.

title: Self-Interest
description: To concern for your own advantage and well-being, especially with disregard to others.

title: Service
description: To contribute to the welfare of others without personal gain.

title: Simplicity
description: To enjoy a simple life.

title: Spirituality
description: To be sensitive or attached to religious values, to have a world view that includes a higher purpose and meaning.

title: Status
description: To gain the respect of others.

title: Tolerance
description: To accept and respect the opinions, way of life, beliefs of others without criticizing them.

title: Wealth
description: Abundance of valuable material possessions or resources.

title: Variety
description: To have many different experiences and situations. Diversity.
